label: Somatic cell nuclear transfer (frog)
description: Somatic (i.e. not egg or sperm) cells can retain potential for totipotency. (Briggs & King)

label: Differentiated cell nuclear transfer (frog)
description: Differentiated cells (more specialized somatic cells) can retain potential for totipotency (Gurdon).

label: First transgenic mouse
description: Novel genomic elements inserted into the mouse genome (Palmiter).

label: Single tf can reprogram cells
description: A single transcription factor (MyoD) can convert one mature cell type into another (Weintraub, @ Fred Hutch).

label: First knockout mouse
description: Early technology in 1987, demonstration of mouse without a targeted gene in 1989. (Capecchi, Evans, Smithies).

label: Human genome project launched
description: Model organisms chosen alongside human - E. coli, yeast, fruit fly, nematode, mouse

label: Dolly the sheep
description: Viable offspring derived from fetal and adult mammalian cells (Wilmut et al.)

label: Illumina founded
description: Makes sequencers, reagents, and consumables.

label: First draft of mouse genome
description: Mouse Genome Sequencing Consortium publishes C57BL/6J genome.

label: Human Genome Project completed
description: International effort finishes the reference human genome.

label: ENCODE project launched
description: NIH begins cataloging functional elements in the human genome.

label: Allen Institute founded
description: Funded by Paul G. Allen to advance neuroscience.

label: Optogenetics demonstration
description: Deisseroth lab shows optical control of neurons using channelrhodopsin-2.

label: Yamanaka factors discovered
description: Four transcription factors reprogram somatic cells into iPSCs.

label: CRISPR adaptive immune function discovered
description: Barrangou et al. reveal CRISPR’s role in bacterial immunity.

label: Human iPSCs created
description: Thomson and Yamanaka reprogram human somatic cells.

label: Single-cell RNA-seq demonstrated
description: Tang et al. sequence transcriptomes from single mammalian cells.

label: Brain clearing (CLARITY) developed
description: Deisseroth lab renders intact tissue transparent for 3D imaging.

label: Expansion microscopy introduced
description: Boyden lab expands fixed tissue for nanoscale imaging.

label: Single-cell ATAC-seq developed
description: Buenrostro et al. map chromatin accessibility at single-cell resolution.

label: Chan Zuckerberg Initiative founded
description: Funded by Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan to support science and education.

label: Cellarity founded
description: Flagship Pioneering launches cell-behavior-driven drug discovery company.

label: 10x Genomics founded
description: Company commercializes single-cell and spatial omics platforms.

label: Arc Institute founded
description: Philanthropically backed biomedical research institute.

label: NewLimit founded
description: Longevity biotech focused on epigenetic reprogramming.

label: Altos Labs founded
description: Privately funded company researching cellular rejuvenation.

label: Ultima Genomics founded
description: DNA sequencing company developing ultra-low-cost sequencing technology.

label: Somite AI founded
description: Venture-backed AI-driven drug discovery startup.

label: Tahoe 100M program announced
description: Large-scale initiative focused on molecular rejuvenation and reprogramming research.

label: Tahoe Therapeutics founded
description: Biotech startup translating reprogramming and rejuvenation science into therapeutics.
